overview: A young orphan who lives with her grandmother in a large Virginian home infatuates herself with the voices of Joan d'Arc. Her French nanny seeks out the help of a rich suitor to take her and the orphan away when she realizes that the grandmother cannot offer the orphan the love that she needs.
tagline: "Zelly Never Made Me Choose Between Being Loved and Being Me..."
title: Zelly and Me
